section.name: Workflow
section.p: The workflow process is fairly simple and can be demonstrated with the example "MyFirstWorkflow"
This workflow is very basic. It first asks the user's name, then their age and then finally their expiry date. The last page gives a summary.

The flow is made up from 4 velocity pages
Hello
HowOldAreYou
EnterExpiryDate
Summary
